top_comments_top.body:
Emily is, at least to me, better known as an actress (Beth in The Walking Dead before I stopped watching it).  Her singing and songwriting voice, however, won me over even before I connected her two careers.  Omaha Hotel is clean and simple and really beautiful.  Enjoy
___
For the past year I have been listening to a LOT of new music every day at work. At the end of each day I choose my favorite and share it with you. See past tracks of the day and follow at https://allenstrackoftheday.com/
